game.name: Golden Self
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A surreal action roguelike blending fast-paced combat, 440+ unique items and intense boss battles. Explore dreamlike dungeons, confront your fragments, in the quest to discover your Golden Self.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A surreal action roguelike blending fast-paced combat, 440+ unique items and intense boss battles. Explore dreamlike dungeons, confront your fragments, in the quest to discover your Golden Self.
